description: The HOLOmister in the Atrium is projecting the wrong advertisements. Investigate why the mist activates when nobody paid to run it.

objectives.description: Stand near the malfunctioning HOLOmister and observe the glitched advertisements
Confirm the Cloud level is above 70 while the unit is still spraying
Scan the HOLOmister for maintenance faults
Trigger a manual override to pause the unit

hints: The mist shouldn't go purple. If it does, back away and log it.
Glitched ads often sync with Toddler activityâ€”check strain levels.
Manual override takes a few seconds; expect a late spray before shutdown.
